summary: An ordinance relating to the municipal light and power plant and system; providing for the sale and conveyance by the City of a portion of Lot 10, Block 1, Herbert S. Upper's Acre Tracts, in exchange for the conveyance to the City of a certain portion of Lots 4 and 5, White's Rainier Beach Gardens, and designating the same as one of the additions, betterments and extending contemplated by Ordinance No. 54006; and declaring an emergency.
